title: Accessible, Research Ready Data.
description: Data wranglers, experts in data curation, quality control, and reproducibility, work with the Research Collaborations to align datasets and standards.

title: Community Building and Training.
description: Establish connections between AIM researchers, and deliver training and mentorship to researchers that support the delivery of open source outputs.

title: Research Sustainability and Legacy.
description: Work with researcher teams to embed outputs in existing clinical and academic, and engage with policy makers to coordinate a long term investment in MLTC research

title: Reproducible, Secure and Interoperable infrastructure.
description: Bring together research collaborations across the UK together within a trusted research environment to facilitate data, software and analysis sharing.

title: Patient and Public Involvement and Engagement.
description: Foster an embedded PPIE community focused on supporting and empowering people with lived experience of MLTC to co-create research alongside academic partners.
